author: Billy
comment: I liked it but getting pop up ads to "like" Pizza Entertainment's facebook page on my phone after *paying* is completely unacceptable. Uninstalling and won't buy again from this vendor.  Do NOT use intrusive advertising with paying customers.

author: Tony McModeNut
comment: After paying for the app you still have the pleasure of being pestered with ads. How nice.
title: Ads galore

author: William Winslow
comment: I like it the watch face. Would be nice if I could change from Celsius to Fahrenheit .

author: Adam Coulthard
comment: This is a great watch face I use with my smart watch 3

author: John Magisano
comment: Works on my new Huawei.  Awesome.
title: Cool minimalistic look.

author: Dee McGee
comment: Does anyone make a good looking TIMER that is not cluttered with a lot of other distracting objects? The clarity of this design is simply beautiful! Draws your attention to the main focus - the time. Since those of us who do public speaking really don't want to be so conspicuous about time by lugging around a big timer or our smartphone, an app for a smartwatch would be perfect. An app that clearly displayed a TIMER (countdown and/stopwatch) INSTEAD of the time - like this watch face would be a dream come true . Ideally it would be nice to be able to toggle between displaying the TIME or a TIMER. And instead of the small weather cloud, perhaps some other symbol like a small digital stopwatch readout (when a countdown timer is being displayed). Many of us would be willing to purchase such an app but can not find ANYONE who makes one as  attractive as your All Text HD Watch Face. Please help!

author: Chris Andersson
comment: But please add option for adding a 0 in front of current time so when the time is "1:40" , for example, it will look like this: "01:40" and option for showing phone battery status, please.
title: Gorgeous watchface!

author: Tadej Kanizar
comment: Could use some additional customization options, but I love the simplistic yet stunning design.
title: Gorgeous

author: Chris Stathis
comment: Very nice, clean face. But please add a dark background. This would really help.

author: Brian James Clarke
comment: Really clean really clear really nice worth the money. Great job
title: Love it

author: Andrei Carp-Petrache
comment: it would be perfect if you could add the temperature near the weather icon

author: Noah Stupak
comment: Nice looking watch face, but would love it if it could display light text on a dark background

author: Rommel Villalobos
comment: Can you fix to 12hr mode?
title: Only avail in military time

author: Andy Pham
comment: Attractive, minimal but still somewhat informative watchface that looks great on the Moto 360. Would love more customizable options in the future, like font choices and font color. It would be nice to have an option for light text on a dark background. Right now, it's limited to dark text on a light background.
title: Great-looking watchface.

author: Jim Y
comment: no option to for no ambient mode like in weather watchface. unfortunately, i had trouble getting it to sync. had to reboot phone and watch and by the time i saw the trouble i missed the refund window. not too happy.
title: no temp diplay on main screen

comment: Very clean design, I like it. The only problem I have with it the ambient mode. The date gets mixed up with the pending notification.
title: Beautiful watch face

author: Luis Gabriel Gerena
comment: Can you add phone battery option too and better yet the option to select color for the font in dim mode?
title: Just two things needed

author: dillon brand
comment: The only watch face I have to do this any help to fix would be appreciated
title: Is not displaying correct time

author: Howard Bamber
comment: It's black on white - ish background. I'd like to have a choice as the other way hides the spare tyre issue better, which brings me to the next point. There should be use of the little world strips along the bottom. Having said alk that I like the face , it works perfectly and with the features I mentioned I'd pay for it.
title: Like it but..

author: Ravitej Chittala
comment: This is one of the best simplistic design I have seen. Please update the face with few features like the phone battery and weather. sharper numbers/icons would be nice. Thank you!
title: Love the look!

author: Richard Ely-Harris
comment: This is probably the smartest looking watch face that I have downloaded for my Wear. Great options,  colours and blends. Any chance of having the option to disable the weather and battery displays?
title: Great Look

author: Mark Davis
comment: Liked this one so much brought the weather face as well..looks wicked on moto 360. Very happy would recommend to anyone. Keep up the great work guys!
title: Nice one!

author: zamboni
comment: All the information I need at a glance. Would love to be able to invert the colors. Black background and white text.
title: Love it

author: Richie O
comment: Love this watch face.  Doesn't clutter up the screen and battery usage is pretty good.
title: Looks great on the moto 360

author: Ronnie Chatterjee
comment: Unlike most faces, this one actually looks as clear as in the pics. Keep me coming!
title: Beautiful!

author: Jerome Triplett
comment: It also seems to be pretty battery friendly.
title: Best looking watch face I've tried.

author: Gary Davisson
comment: No way to change to Fahrenheit
title: No temp

author: Risvi Yoosuf
comment: Beautiful but please add temperature.
title: Lovely

author: Ron Zeng
comment: Extremely nice on my moto 360

author: Harvz B
comment: No ambient

author: Armando Santiago
comment: Looks Sharp
title: LG Urbane

author: Alex Mason
comment: Looks good on ZenWatch
title: Great

author: Justin Gannon
comment: Most of the watch faces available really overdo it, I find this one to be pretty much perfect.  There's just enough on the face without it being too much and customizable color means it goes with anything.  One nice improvement would be the ability to save a palette of favorite colors.
title: Beautiful.

author: Joey Sanchez
comment: Very nice watch face for my Lg g watch r!
title: Nice

author: Brian Ciatti
comment: Great but I want the face to be black and the text to be white and I didn't see the option to change to text color
title: Allow changing of font color
